clientscript.name: ARKA_CUE_Est_dispatcher1
clientscript.description: This is a ClientScript dispatcher for the estimate record. It's purpose is to combine the scripts: ARKA_CUE_BluebeamHandleDynamicSalesRep, ARKA_CUE_fillContactOptions, ARKA_CUE_NBEPersonas, ARKA_CUE_RemoveCustomerStatuses, ARKA_CUE_SetExpectedCloseDateField, ARKA_CUE_TenderCheckboxControl, ARKA_CUE_TransactionDepValidation, ARKA_EST_SetContractFields onto a single file for performance improvements. Please refer to each individual file to see how they works

scriptdeployments.scriptdeployment: T DEBUG ESTIMATE RELEASED false T
